metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1534 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Over-read at parse_rawml.c:1416 in GitHub repository bfabiszewski/libmobi prior to 0.11. The bug causes the program reads data past the end of the intented buffer. Typically, this can allow attackers to read sensitive information from other memory locations or cause a crash.

criterions.comment: libmobi package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
